//xxxxxxxxxInstructionxxxxxxxxxxxx 
//xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxxx xxxxx xxxxx]
//xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxx] [xxxx]
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]
10001100000000010000000000000000	//0
//load from 0 to 1, then check
00000000000000010000100000100000
00000000000000010000100000100000	//2
//load form 1 to 2, then check
10001100000000100000000000000001
00000000000000100001000000100000	//4
//add 1 & 2 to 3, check
00000000001000100001100000100000
00000000000000110001100000100000	//6
//subtract 3 from 1 to 4, check
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]
00000000001000110010000000100010
00000000000001000010000000100000	//8
//stl 1 < 4 to 5, check
00000000100000010010100000101010
00000000000001010010100000100000	//10
//sw
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]
10101100000000110000000000000110
10101100011001000000000000000100	//12
10001100011001100000000000000011
10001100000001110000000000000111	//14
00000000000001100011000000100000
00000000000001110011100000100000	//16
//should not brnch
00010000001000000000000000000001
00000000000001000010000000100000	//18
//should branch
00010000000000000000000000000001
00000000000001000010000000100000	//20
//
//addi: 0 and (10) to 8
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]
00100000000010000000000000001010
00000000000010000100000000100000	//22
//addi: 3 to (-2) to 9
00100000011010011111111111111110
00000000000010010100100000100000	//24
//j
00001000000000000000000000000011
//
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]
//addiu: 3 and (-1) to 10
00100100011010101111111111111111	//26
00000000000010100101000000100000
//addiu: 3 and (-big) to 11
00100100011010111111100000000000	//28
00000000000010110101100000100000
//andi: 3 and (2) to 12
00110000011011000000000000000010	//30
00000000000011000110000000100000
//andi: 3 and (big) to 13
00110000011011010000000000111111	//32
00000000000011010110100000100000
//xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxx][xxxx]
//bne: should branch
00010100011000010000000000000001	//34
00000000000000110001100000100000
//bne: should not branch
00010100011000110000000000000001	//36
00000000000000110001100000100000
//ori: 3 or (big) to 14
00110100011011100000000000111001	//38
00000000000011100111000000100000
//slti: 
00101000011011110000000000000001	//40
00000000000011110111100000100000
//slti: 
00101000011100000000000000001000	//42
00000000000100001000000000100000
